section.p: Welcome to the Football Management App. This application allows you to manage football leagues, teams, and fixtures efficiently.
To start using the app, ensure you have a valid API key. Access to the Football API is essential for fetching football data, including leagues, teams, and fixtures.
Follow these steps to download and set up the data:

ul.li: Download Countries: Download the list of countries.
Download Seasons: After countries, download the football seasons available.
Assign Countries and Seasons: Select a country and choose a season. Each country can only have one active season at a time.

section.p: Select 'Leagues' to fetch the available leagues. The system will prompt you to select which leagues to follow. Note that not all leagues are covered by betting houses.
After setting up the leagues, proceed to download team information for the selected leagues.
Download standings to view current positions and rankings for each league.
Fetch the rounds for the selected leagues to track fixtures and results.
Finally, download the fixtures for the selected leagues, providing detailed information on upcoming matches.
